register_args.label: Articles
register_args.description: An article is the main post type in OES. It is used for the individual content entries or articles of the encyclopedia or reference work (i.e. lemmas)

single__toc__header_citation.name: Überschrift: Zitierweise (kann sich vom Feldlabel unterscheiden)

register_args.label: Article Parents
register_args.description: Parent post type to demo_article that stores meta data for all versions of an demo_article object.

register_args.label: Bibliographical Entries
register_args.description: A bibliography is a list of works on a subject or by an contributor that were used or consulted to write a research paper, book or article. A single work is referred to as bibliographic entry.

fields.name: field_bib_dummy
fields.message: The following fields could be imported from or synced to Zotero. This feature will be available in a future release.

register_args.label: Contributors
register_args.description: A contributor is a person contributing to the encyclopedia: an author (someone writing articles, glossary entries etc.), a co-author, an editor (responsible for editing and publishing the content), a translator, etc..

register_args.label: Glossary Entries
register_args.description: A glossary entry is part of a glossary, i.e. an alphabetical list of difficult, technical, or foreign words in a text along with explanations of their meanings.

register_args.label: Institutions
register_args.description: Post type to describe properties of an institution. Also used to build an index for encyclopaedic entries.

register_args.label: People
register_args.description: Post type to describe the properties of a person, including name, authorative data etc. Also used to build an index for encyclopaedic entries.

register_args.label: Places
register_args.description: Post type to describe properties of a place, including name, authorative data etc. Also used to build an index for encyclopaedic entries.

single__toc__header_toc.name: Single: Table of Contents
single__toc__header_toc.location: Single view, table of contents header

register_args.label: Article Types
register_args.description: Taxonomy to categorize objects of type demo_article

register_args.label: Keywords
register_args.description: Taxonomy to describe a subject. Used to build an index for encyclopaedic entries.

register_args.label: Times
register_args.description: Taxonomy to describe an area or time of event. Used to build an index for encyclopaedic entries.
